items.title: Dow plunges more than 1,400 points as stocks react to tariff shock
items.description: The Dow opened sharply lower as investors fret over the potential economic impact of President Trump's latest tariffs.

items.title: Severe storms in South and Midwest turn deadly
items.description: Violent storms cut through a wide swath of the South and Midwest, spawning tornadoes and killing at least two people, knocking down power lines and tr...

items.title: Rare life-sized statues of toga-clad couple found in Pompeii tomb
items.description: The couple may have been married, and the woman appears to have been a priestess, researchers said.

items.title: Which products will be affected by new tariffs announced by Trump?
items.description: President Trump rolled out new tariffs on April 2 aimed at easing trade imbalances. Here's which products could become more expensive as a result.

items.title: 2025 Atlantic hurricane season will be above average, researchers predict
items.description: A new forecast from researchers at Colorado State University predicts the 2025 hurricane season will be busier than an average year.
